d.homeDescription:
Full stack .net developer, naturaly self-learner i love learn new things and develop ideas.

I worked in bankary projects,insurances,concesionaries,and internal systems for clients like Sancor,Isban,Ernst & Young,Oversoft,Fresenius and WellSky.

Currently learning solidity and blockchain development : )

projects.name: Unity Blocks
projects.description:
Developed with


c#
monodevelop
unity

Each game object has a script that controls its interaction with the rest of the game
Bar

-Update its position asigning a movement vector that varies in function of the direction keys pressed


-Its position can be reseted in case of be needed

Ball
Balls interactions are control when can be moved and not and the position reset


Blocks
-Is a collition is detected asociated gameobject is destroyed and a point is added calling
the respecting class.Then a particle effect is instantied arount the block.


The remaining scripts porpuse are game flow control,win/loose lifes,sounds and more.

projects.name: Curiosity api
projects.description:
This site is based in consume an api that return images
from rover curiosity that was launched in mars in 2011 and fulfill scientific tasks of geological
recognition and habitability

Stack used:

HTML5
Bootstrap
Javascript
Jquery
Jqueryui
Fancybox

projects.name: Sudoku generator
projects.description:
Work in two stages:
In the load screen a seed sudoku is generated that after is used as base for generate other sudokus

The other stage is validate that the game is being well solved
fullfilling that noone value is repetead in any


Other functions

-Progress bar that shows the advance
-Win button that solve the sudoku
-Option for enable/disable the help
With the possible valid values for a cell

Developed with

Html5
Bootstrap
Javascript
Jquery

projects.name: Java threads
projects.description:
Java app that simulate a race between two instances of a competitor class executing in parallel
The competitor class is abstract with a method calculateEvent
The competitor has an abstract from wich inherits and overrite the calculateEvent method

An event is an enumeration of values that make advance or go backward in the race

Both competitors are executed synchronously using latch and await

projects.name: Winform manager
projects.description:
Winform app that allow the user to read,update and delete from a sql remote database.

Developed with

c#
Entity Framework

projects.name: Winmips Asm
projects.description:
Program that write in an rgb screen using an i/o mapped in memory and differents rutines.
Runs in a winimps emulator with risc architecture using asm language

Mips microprocessors (Microprocessor without Interlocked Pipeline Stages)were used in many embebed systems like nintendo 64,playstation one,playstation 2 and psp.And in recent projcets like new horizons nasa probe.
